text: “tavada ‘ma parisuddhavantayeki’ yayi (mava mama ma prasamsa) kara gænimata pæminiye næta. mandayat mage deviyan dayava pahala kalahot misa, (minisunge) sit papayan karana men polambavannata hækkak vasayenma ætteya. niyata vasayenma mage deviyan itamat ksama karanneku ha karunavantayeku vasayen sitinneya” (yayi kiveya)
